narrative:
Licensee voluntarily surrendered his USDA license certificate at time of this inspection. He is no longer engaged in 
covered activities licensed by the USDA. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
